articles.title: Hostile forces warned against use of international humanitarian aid for dishonest political purpose
Preparatory committee for commemorating Sun's Day formed in Russia
articles.content:
Hostile forces warned against use of international humanitarian aid for dishonest political purpose
     Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the flood damage rehabilitation committee of the DPRK released a statement on March 15 as regards recent ill-boding moves to use international humanitarian aid to the DPRK for a dishonest political purpose.
   Typical of it was a recent program of the third channel of French television which slandered the socialist system in North Korea, the spokesman said, and continued:
   In the program those who betrayed the nation after committing high crimes defamed the system in North Korea and painted a wrong picture of its economic situation in accordance with the trite script made by the plotters of South Korea.
   Especially, some non-governmental organisation members, including those of the "Action Contre La Faim" (ACT) involved in humanitarian aid activity in North Korea in the television appearance groundlessly faulted arrangements for observers at aid  distribution. They went So far as to vilify the DPRK over a political issue which had nothing to do with the aid.
   The vicious anti-DPRK diatribe came at a time when the South Korean intelligence service was zealously spreading a rumour that three million people died of starvation in North Korea in the past four years, in a bid to frustrate international humanitarian aid to it. So, the recent anti-DPRK campaign cannot be considered to be a separate one at all. It proves that with a view to using international humanitarian aid for the "disintegration and overthrow" of the system in North Korea hostile elements are now turning to an extremely despicable means.
   We are exerting every possible effort to make sure that international humanitarian aid is effectively used for stable living of the people in the afflicted areas and rehabilitation in those areas and rendering every sincere cooperation to aid organisations in their performance.
   As already clarified, the DPRK has always adhered to the principled stand that it welcomes any aid,  purely humanitarian, but it will not accept any aid with political conditionally meant to serve a sinister aim.
   We will never pardon those who dare vilify the political and socialist systems in North Korea, whoever they may be and whatever the reason.
   The responsibility for consequences of the recent smear campaign will lie with those who orchestrated the farce and those involved in it.

articles.title: Labour organizations in S. Korea vow to struggle
articles.content:
Preparatory committee for commemorating Sun's Day formed in Russia
  Moscow, March 13 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Russian public figures for commemorating Sun's Day was inaugurated in Moscow on Thursday on the occasion of the 87th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Oleg Shenin, chairman of the Council of the Union of Communist Parties--the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
   The preparatory committee made public an appeal to the progressive political parties and public organizations of the world.
   The appeal said that the Korean people and the world's progressives set the birthday of President Kim Il Sung as Sun's day and highly praised him. 
   Korea is now shedding unprecedentedly bright rays as the President built the socialist system, a genuine people's system, it said, and went on:
   The great leader Kim Jong Il, who is carrying forward the cause of the President, guides the Korean people victoriously to the road shown by the President.
   Today the DPRK has become an ever-lasting beacon for the oppressed and maltreated peoples of the world.
   It called upon all the progressive political parties and public organizations of the world to commemorate the glorious April 15 significantly together with the Korean people.

articles.title: U.S. blamed for defying UN
articles.content:
Labour organizations in S. Korea vow to struggle
   Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) - The South Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) called a press conference in Yongdungpho, Seoul, on Thursday and demanded a halt to unilateral "restructuring," reduction of working hours and two other terms from the authorities, a Seoul-based radio reported.
   The KCTU declared that it would wage an all-out struggle in March and April unless these demands are met.
   Meanwhile, the Federation of South Korean Trade Unions held an emergency meeting of representatives on Wednesday and declared that it would stage an all-out struggle against the "government" to realize its six demands for vital rights.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, great leader of national reunification
articles.content:
U.S. blamed for defying UN
  Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The United States is trying to turn the United Nations into an organisation in which it stands unchallenged, an organisation that acts under its orders, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed article.
   The article came in the wake of the disclosure of the fact that the U.S. planted agents of the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) in the united nations special committee in charge of dismantling Iraq's weapons of mass destruction and used the committee for spying on Iraq.
   The UN is the world body whose principle is impartiality and justice and so no privilege should be given to a specific country in it, the article says, and goes on:
   The U.S., describing itself as a "giant in the world," acts its own way, defying the UN.
   The U.S. engagement in espionage through abuse of UN efforts for arms inspection in Iraq clearly shows how it looks down upon the world body.
   The U.S. behaves with overbearance, utterly disregarding the UN its misbehavior undermines confidence in the UN among its member nations.
   It is the vicious habit of the U.S. that defies and fools the UN. the U.S. puts pressure on other countries by abusing the name of the UN, if necessary and acts as it desires, defying the UN.
   The arrogance of the U.S. deserves punishment by the international community.

articles.title: Korean people's cause supported
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, great leader of national reunification
   Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today carries a signed article on the wise guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il over the Korean people's movement for national reunification. 
   The article says:
   Kim Jong Il is the great leader who, regarding  it as his lifelong mission to achieve national reunification by carrying out the great leader president Kim Il Sung's behests of reunification, has successfully carried forward the cause of reunification pioneered and led by the President.
   He defined the three principles of national reunification, the 10-Point Programme for the Great Unity of the Whole Nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Confederal Republic of Koryo advanced by the President as three charters of national reunification which systematizes and consummates basic principles and ways of the country's reunification in an integral way.
   The five-point policy for great national unity set forth by Kim Jong Il is a highly important guideline and  banner of national unity and reunification which clearly indicate the basic principles, ideological basis and targets of great national unity and tasks and ways to put them into effect.
   He is the outstanding leader who has led the cause of national reunification to brilliant victory with his extraordinary and tested leadership and distinguished far-sightedness.  The reunification movement of the Korean nation has developed onto a new higher stage under his tested leadership, making  amazing changes.
   He has led the whole nation to conduct the relentless struggle to frustrate the moves of the separatists at home and abroad in firm unity under the banner of patriotism and national reunification, resolutely rejecting dependence upon outside forces.
   He is the fatherly leader who takes good care of the whole nation with politics of love and trust, magnanimous politics.  His noble love for the people and nation is the source of power which leads Koreans from all walks of life to national unity and reunification.
   As Kim Jong Il, a peerlessly great man, leads the cause of national reunification, a reunified and prosperous powerful nation will surely  be built.

articles.title: Deceptive renaming
articles.content:
Korean people's cause supported 
   Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A joint statement supporting the Korean people's struggle for building a powerful nation and the reunification of the country was adopted at the third symposium of American regional political parties on building a new society which was held in Mexico on the occasion of the 57th birthday of Kim Jong Il.
   The joint statement extended support to the firm stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean People's Army stating that they will meet with an annihilating blow the challenge of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces  through a statement issued by the spokesman of the KPA general staff last year, and urged the U.S. warmongers to stop the war moves of aggression.
   It expressed the belief that the Korean people singleheartedly united around Kim Jong Il would adorn this year as a year of a great turning-point in building a powerful nation.
   It also urged the South Korean authorities to respond to the proposal for national reunification set forth at the joint meeting of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations held on February 3 and to immediately clear all institutional obstacles lying in the way of reunification.
   It called upon all progressive parties of the world to turn out in a solidarity movement for Korean reunification.

articles.title: Sun's Day to be commemorated in Austria
articles.content:
Deceptive renaming
   Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The "National Congress for New Politics" (NCNP), one of the ruling parties of South Korea, on Thursday decided to rename "State Human Rights Committee" (tentative name) "People's Human Rights Committee," a Seoul-based radio said.
   The "NCNP" announced that all the nine members of the committee would be appointed by the "President" while crying that "it would be a neutral organization independent of the 'State'."
   However, nobody will be stunned by such renaming by the ruling quarters, who are maintaining and enforcing the anti-human right "National Security Law" and "law-abiding oath system" while elevating and enlarging the repressive organs. 
   It is a cock-and-bull story to vociferate about "neutrality" of the committee, which will be run by those appointed by the "President."

articles.title: Signal success reported from research center
articles.content:
Sun's Day to be commemorated in Austria
   Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- An Austrian preparatory committee for commemorating Sun's Day was formed in Vienna Wednesday on the occasion of the 87th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   The preparatory committee discussed and decided the programme of functions for commemorating Sun's Day and called for widely propagandizing the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and the great leader Kim Jong Il, through all the functions, and fully supporting the Korean people in their struggle for building a powerful nation.

articles.title: Planned "combined use of Chinese characters" flailed
articles.content:
Signal success reported from research center
   Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Scientists and technicians of the Hamhung branch of the academy of sciences are all out in building a powerful country.
   The great leader Kim Jong Il, when calling at the branch on March 7, expressed great satisfaction over the scientific and technological achievements made by the researchers.
   Following their great contribution to building a Juche-based vinalon industry the scientists and technicians there have succeeded in researches into synthetic fibre, synthetic resin and synthetic rubber, new catalyst and means of analysis necessary for fertilizer production, highly-efficient weed killer and insecticide and lots of other basic chemical products, and put them into industrialization.
   They also succeeded in researches into producing printing circuit board and high-degree chemical reagents and chemical materials which are instrumental in electronic and automation industry.
   Founded in Juche 49 (1960), the branch has developed into a comprehensive research centre for the Juche-based chemical industry of Korea.
   The branch houses scores of institutes and research rooms including the methanol institute, the institute of organic chemistry, the institute of inorganic chemistry, the institute of analytical chemistry and others. It boasts up-to-date material and technical foundations for research and for its completion and for dissemination and introduction of its successes.
   The branch is staffed with hundreds of doctors and professors and other academic degree or title holders and promising young scientists.
   About 100 scientific and technological achievements made by the branch won national and international patents.
   The branch is in touch with many other countries for scientific and technological exchange.

articles.title: Pak Song Chol meets Lao party delegation
articles.content:
Planned "combined use of Chinese characters" flailed
    Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- "Combined use of Chinese characters" coined by the chief executive of South Korea has come under strong criticism by South Korean people from all walks of life.
   The planned "combined use of Chinese characters" is an anti-national crime perpetrated by the present chief executive in response to his master's advise given during the former's tour of Japan last October that the use of Korean language in official documents is not understandable.
   More than 100 members of the "national emergency measure committee for struggle against the combined use of Chinese characters" and the "society of Korean language" held in Seoul on March 1 a ceremony for declaring the originality of Korean language, calling for the cancellation of the authorities' "policy on the combined use of Chinese characters".
   In another development, some 100 members of the "society of Korean language" and the "institute of correct Korean language" at a rally in Seoul denounced the authorities' plan for the combined use of Chinese characters, calling for its drop.
   Earlier, personages from all walks of life held a rally in Seoul, at which they stated the authorities' move runs counter to the trend of history, criticizing the move as an act of spoiling the originality of the Korean language.
